title: UDO - 2002 - Man And Machine [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Man and Machine is U.D.O.'s eighth studio album. Since their last studio effort, U.D.O. had released the live album Live from Russia in 2001.

The album was recorded at Roxx Studio, Pulheim from September 2001 to January 2002.
"Dancing with an Angel" features Doro Pesch of Warlock and Doro in a duet with Dirkschneider.

MP3 - 320kbs
  
"Man and Machine"       - 5:40
"Private Eye"           - 3:57
"Animal Instinct"       - 4:12
"The Dawn of the Gods"  - 4:53
"Dancing with an Angel" - 4:12 - "(feat. Doro Pesch)" 
"Silent Cry"            - 5:22
"Network Nightmare"     - 4:04
"Hard to Be Honest"     - 4:51
"Like a Lion"           - 4:16
"Black Heart"           - 4:32
"Unknown Traveller"     - 6:52
